mapper.select: SELECT b.bill_id as billId, b.bill_name as billName, b.bill_account_number as billAccountNumber, b.bill_due_amount as billAmountDue, b.bill_due_date as billDueDate, b.bill_amount_past_due as billAmountPastDue, bt.bill_type_name as billType, b.bill_balance as billBalance FROM bills b JOIN bill_type bt ON b.bill_type_id = bt.bill_type_id WHERE bt.bill_type_id = #{i}
